name: Dungeon Heros!
description: This a 2D game that you are a ghost and need to fight evil and do quests to gain money to spend for better gear or potions. I recently started to work on it myself with help from a smart guy named Kevin, who has taught me how to code in the first place. The game has been 1 month in development. It might take a year to finish because this is the first time Kevin and I have used Godot before, which is why it might take a long time.
